name: Cafe Management System
description: Lofi Cafe Management System is a retail management system (RMS) that handles basic cafe operations efficiently. Features a JWT authentication system, mailing system, and CRUD operations for managing categories, products, bills, and staff.
technologies: Angular, Typescript, HTML5, SCSS, Spring Boot, Java, Maven, mySQL

name: write:here
description: Scans an image file for handwritten text, parses it into digital text using AI-powered technology, and sends it as an email. Submitted to Hackville 2023 and won Most Creative Use of Github.
technologies: ReactJS, Typescript, NextJS, Google Vision API, co:here NPL

name: Cryptocurrency Checker
description: Fetches the latest crypto currency data in CAD/USD, including price, 24h change, and market cap. Established a Chart.js and Cloud Firestore based dataflow to allow for dynamic server‚Äêdriven content updates.
technologies: Angular, Typescript, HTML5, CSS, Coin Gecko API

name: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
description: Allows users to sort a random array in ascending/descending using bubble sort, insertion sort, selection sort, merge sort, and/or quick sort.
